meanings.definition: The act of delivering something again.
meanings.sent1: The redelivery of the package was scheduled for tomorrow.
meanings.sent2: I missed the first delivery, so I had to request a redelivery.
meanings.sent3: The redelivery of the lost mail brought a smile to my face.
meanings.sent4: Her redelivery of the speech was more confident and engaging.
meanings.sent5: The redelivery of the cake was a sweet surprise for the party guests.

meanings.definition: The process of receiving a delivery that was previously attempted but unsuccessful.
meanings.sent1: After the failed delivery, the redelivery was successful.
meanings.sent2: I had to sign for the redelivery of the important documents.
meanings.sent3: The redelivery of the pizza made us all laugh at the mix-up.
meanings.sent4: His redelivery of the news was met with skepticism by the team.
meanings.sent5: The redelivery of the online order finally arrived after the delay.
